item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition Service Datatype Description Configuration definition gives you details of the value that you’re setting. Some monitoring agents requires values unique to your system. If value type is defined as “Resource Specific Values”, you will have to make an additional API call to retrieve your system specific values. See [[SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent::getAvailableConfigurationValues|Monitoring Agent]] service to retrieve your system specific values. Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime
